channel.title: Runescape Private Server
channel.description: I am working on a 508 server and was wondering, is it allowed to earn money from it and make a website for it?

item.title: Runescape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:3, topic:412459”]What do you mean with offshore webhost?

Btw, I was thinking about making a forum actually, not a website. With Forumotion for example.[/quote]
A free webhost/website, because I think that would be dumb to be honest, I would use at least SMF so you don’t have to pay for anything.

And hosting a RSPS on an offshore webhost is the best thing to do because Jagex can’t touch you.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Private Server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yes, but I would recommend purchasing an offshore webhost so Jagex can’t do something about it. You should and would want to take in donations in order to keep the server and forum alive, but don’t bother going power hungry.

Read full topic
